item.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Fundamentals
item.description: In 2022, knowing how to handle data is as important as kowing how to handle applications in the cloud. This is my first certification that proves that I know the fundamentals of data management. Looking forward to the future when I can become an expert at data management.

item.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals
item.description: I am very proud of this certificate as it is my first ever certification. Although I’m more experienced in AWS, I still decided to try my shot at azure. With a few days of learning I’m happy that I could achieve it. I hope this certification paves the way for me to learn and do more in the cloud realm.
